name: Alien't
description:
You're an alien. Your ship got impounded and your tech was confiscated.
Unleash hell in a secret government facility and take everything back.

Features
  • Go on a rampage!
  • Kill bureaucrats!
  • Unlock three unique powerful abilities.
  • High quality low-poly graphics with a bit of retro feel.
  • Local Co-op mode.
  • Explosions!
  • 20-60 minutes of gameplay (depending on how many times you die).
Abilities

There are three abilities placed on map. You need to pick all three up, but the order in which you do so in on you.

Plasma launcher

Shoots projectile which then detonates into a large plasma ball with aoe damage.

Shield backpack

Grants temporary shield that almost completely mitigates damage.

Teleportation headset

Allows player to blink (teleport) a short distance, while confusing pursuing enemies for brief moment.

Controls Keyboard + Mouse
  • WASD – Character movement
  • MOUSE MOVEMENT – Aim
  • LMB – Use weapon
  • SHIFT – Dash
  • Abilities
    • SPACE – Blink
    • MMB – Plasma Ball
    • RMB – Energy Shield
Gamepad 
  • LEFT STICK – Character movement
  • RIGHT STICK – Aim
  • R1 – Use weapon
  • LEFT STICK (press) – Dash
  • Abilities
    • L2/LT – Blink
    • R2/RT – Plasma Ball
    • L1/LB – Energy Shield
Credits

This game is the outcome of a 4 month long gamedev course joint between different universities in the Czech Republic. It was made by a team of four people.
